about_the_game:
Snowfallen Survivors Chest, Part II

With a frosty chill setting in over the Constant, many of our Survivors have chosen to embrace the cold. Embody the spirit of winter with all the icy niceties and frozen flair befitting a seasoned seasonal celebrator.

Happy Winter's Feast!

Includes
  • Walter's Snowfallen Skin Set
  • Warly's Snowfallen Skin Set
  • Wortox's Snowfallen Skin Set
  • WX-78's Snowfallen Skin Set
  • Winona's Snowfallen Skin Set

  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
